product_name: Roxy Syncro Front-Zip Stand Up Paddle Jacket - Women's
long_description: The women's Roxy Syncro Front-Zip Stand Up paddle jacket offers the perfect amount of warmth to let you stay out just a bit longer. Outer polyurethane coating offers light insulation and it resists spray and splashes. Polyester fleece lining and polypropylene rear panel feel soft against skin, wick moisture and enhance warmth. Full-length zipper makes it easy to put on the Roxy Syncro Front-Zip Stand Up paddle jacket at a moment's notice. Underarm and rear panels of stretchy fabric enhance ventilation. Flatlock stitching reduces chafing. Rear envelope-style pocket stores extras, and headphone cord port lets you bring along the tunes. Hand wash the Roxy Syncro Front-Zip paddle jacket and line dry.
short_description: The women's Roxy Syncro Front-Zip Stand Up paddle jacket offers the perfect amount of warmth to let you stay out just a bit longer.
